name: Cut Mark Cheat
description:
Cut Mark Cheat is a dice making simulator, where you can cut a dice from a piece of wood, mark dots on it's sides, and then throw it - to test how it rolls!

Fair players and cheaters request different probabilities for each dice you make. Be careful with that knife and marker - you cannot un-cut or un-mark the wood! Cut it to small piece or make completely dirty - and you're screwed!

Made by buday (Ruslan Budaev) and Sioxanne (Oxana Rumyantseva) for GMTK Game Jam 2022 in 48 hours
